title: The Best of the Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of the Dan Patrick Show
description:
Doug Gottlieb and TJ Houshmandzandeh in for Dan.  They recap the weekend of NFL pre-season games and give their thoughts on how things went with Deshaun Watson and the Browns. 

FOX Sports Radio Insider Adam Caplan joins Doug and TJ to talk about the latest with Lamar Jackson,  Deshaun Watson and the other main NFL headlines coming off of the weekend. 

They weigh in on the troubling news about a shooting death at a youth football game.  Doug and TJ talk about the difficulties the Cowboys continue to have with penalties. 

#DougGottliebShow  #UpOnGame

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
